pullRequest.title: Fix #241: Upgrade to Gradle 5.2.1
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove duplicate wrapper task
Upgrade jmh plugin
Ignore warnings on deprecated APIs in PegasusPlugin
The replacement APIs were introduced in Gradle 5.1; if we fix these deprecations, we break backwards-compatibility with earlier Gradle versions

commit.message:
Fix #241: Upgradle to Gradle 5.2.1

 - Remove duplicate wrapper task
 - Upgrade jmh plugin
 - Ignore warnings on deprecated APIs in PegasusPlugin
 - The replacement APIs were introduced in Gradle 5.1; if we fix these deprecations, we break backwards-compatibility with earlier Gradle versions
